text: Otis Burt "Sonny" Shroyer, Jr. (born August 28, 1935) is an American actor and singer. He is known for his role as Deputy Sheriff Enos Strate in the television series The Dukes of Hazzard. He also starred in a short-lived spin- off called Enos. He was born in Valdosta, Georgia. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Singers from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Sonny Shroyer
